scripts.ai18n-gpt: cd node_modules/ai18n && npx tsx src/workspace/sofa.ts loadLocales loadCode dumpCodeToLocales gptTranslate saveLocales

scripts.ai18n-import: cd node_modules/ai18n && npx tsx src/workspace/sofa.ts loadLocales loadCode importLark saveLocales
scripts.ai18n-dumpCodeToLocales: cd node_modules/ai18n && npx tsx src/workspace/sofa.ts loadLocales loadCode dumpCodeToLocales saveLocales
scripts.ai18n-export: cd node_modules/ai18n && npx tsx src/workspace/sofa.ts loadLocales loadCode exportLark
